entrypoints.name: step
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --package celestia --bin step --release build && mv ./target/release/step ./build/step

entrypoints.name: skip
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --package celestia --bin skip --release build && mv ./target/release/skip ./build/skip

entrypoints.name: data-commitment
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --package celestia --bin data_commitment --release build && mv ./target/release/data_commitment ./build/data_commitment
